title: Tales From The Hood
itunes:title: Tales From The Hood
description:
On this episode, The Crew talks about Sam Sneed's stint on Death Row, Tupac's affiliation and review Keffe D's new book. Make sure you subscribe and rate the show! Go purchase the new Mob James T-Shirt at Amazon.com https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07RGCH9Q5 Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.
